text: Moslem Darabi (Persian: مسلم دارابی) (born 1981 in Sahneh, Kurdish city in the Kermanshah province) is an Iranian strongman, he is the 2 time reigning Iran's Strongest Man.بیوگرافی مسلم دارابیفيناليست هاي مردان آهنين مشخص شدند World’s Strongest Man w IranieSecond place for Moslem Darabi in Qeshm international competition Iranian supremacy in the tournament world strongest men ==Strongman career== Darabi participated several times in Iran's Strongest Man competition,مسلم دارابی قهرمان مسابقات مردان آهنین شد and reached the finals three times from 2009–2011. He finished runner-up in 2009 & 2010 and become the champion in 2011 and successfully defended his title in 2012. ==References== ==External links== *مردان آهنین سال1390 * https://web.archive.org/web/20110829024313/http://moslemdarabi.com/home.html ==See also== *Iran's Strongest Man *World Strongman Cup Federation Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian powerlifters Category:Iranian strength athletes Category:Kurdish sportspeople Category:People from Sahneh
title: Moslem Darabi
